nodes.text: Tin Withrafisp was an individual who served as satrap of the planet Akiva's Satrapy. By the time Isstra Dirus—one of Withrafisp's successors—ruled as Satrap several months after the Battle of Endor, a gold-framed portrait of Withrafisp was displayed in the Satrap's Palace in Myrra, capital city of Akiva. The portrait showed Withrafisp as having a jaundiced and sickly countenance. Several other Withrafisps ruled as satraps throughout Akiva's history, and an avenue in Myrra shared their name.
Tin Withrafisp was created by author Chuck Wendig for the novel Aftermath, which was released in 2015.
